original_text: then, if the king's anger rises, and if he says to you, ‘Why did you go so near the city to fight? Did you not know that they would shoot from the wall?
korean_text: 혹시 왕이 노하여 네게 말씀하기를 너희가 어찌하여 성에 그처럼 가까이 가서 싸웠느냐 그들이 성 위에서 쏠 줄을 알지 못하였느냐

sentences.original_text: and if he says to you,
Why did you go so near the city to fight?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 너는 싸우려고 그 성에 그리 가까이 갔느냐?

sentences.original_text: Did you not know that they would shoot from the wall?'
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 성벽에서 쏠 것을 너는 알지 못했느냐?'
